content:
The Streaming Channel API type uses the Streaming API to send notifications of general events that are not tied to Salesforce data changes. Use the Streaming Channel API when you want to send and receive notifications based on custom events that you specify.

Use Streaming Channel API for any application that sends custom notifications, such as a Chat application.

For example, use the Streaming Channel data source for a Chat application for the users in your org.

Enable the Streaming Channel data source to send and receive notifications based on custom events that you specify.
title: Streaming Channel API in Salesforce
